entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 10:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: NNW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with ice pellets late in the evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then becoming west 40 gusting to 70. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
